title: Kenny's Khaos
shortPitch: Join Kenny on a chaotic adventure through procedurally generated worlds filled with puzzles, enemies, and unexpected surprises at every turn.
fullDescription: Kenny's Khaos is a roguelike action-adventure that throws players into ever-changing worlds where no two runs are the same. As Kenny, a quirky hero with a knack for finding trouble, you'll navigate through procedurally generated levels filled with challenging enemies, mind-bending puzzles, and hidden secrets. The game features a unique chaos system where player actions affect the world's stability, leading to increasingly unpredictable and exciting gameplay.
features: Unique puzzle mechanics that change each run
Multiple endings based on chaos level
